trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which the workflow runtime engine core services are derived.
trans-unit.target: Representerer abstrakt basisklasse som arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kjernetjenestene er avledet fra.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Services that derive from the WorkflowRuntimeService class can be started and stopped by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Tjenester som er avledet fra klassen WorkflowRuntimeService kan startet og stoppet av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren.

trans-unit.source: The order in which the services are started or stopped, however, is indeterminate, and services may require the support of other services in order to properly initialize themselves when they are started, and, conversely, may require the to support of other services in order to properly shut down when they are stopped.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen tjenestene er startet eller stoppet, men ubestemt, og services kan kreve støtte for andre tjenester for å initialisere selv når de er startet, og, derimot kan kreve at den støtter riktig av andre tjenester for å avslutte når de er stoppet.

trans-unit.source: To address this problem, the workflow runtime engine provides two-phase mechanisms for starting and stopping services.
trans-unit.target: For å løse dette problemet gir arbeidsflyten runtime motoren tofaset mekanismer for å starte og stoppe tjenester.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> is called, the workflow runtime engine invokes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method for each of its services that derive from the WorkflowRuntimeService class.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>kalles arbeidsflyten runtime motoren aktiverer <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metode for hver av tjenestene som avledet fra klassen. WorkflowRuntimeService</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: After all of these services have been started, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event, which causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> method to be invoked for each workflow runtime engine service.
trans-unit.target: Når alle disse tjenestene har startet, arbeidsflyt runtime motoren opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>som fører til at den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>metoden som skal aktiveres for hver arbeidsflyt runtime-motortjeneste.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Your service can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> method to participate in this two phase process.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten kan overstyre den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>metode for å delta i denne to faser.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> method provide this two-phase mechanism.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte, når <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>kalles, den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>-metoden i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>hendelse, og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>metoden har denne tofaset mekanisme.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The State property contains a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> value that indicates whether the service is in the process of starting or stopping or is completely started or stopped.
trans-unit.target: State-egenskapen inneholder en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>verdi som angir om tjenesten er i ferd med å startes eller stoppes eller fullstendig startet eller er stoppet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>

trans-unit.source: Services that derive from the WorkflowRuntimeService class can raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event when they encounter a condition that causes an unhandled exception by calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tjenester som er avledet fra klassen WorkflowRuntimeService kan øke <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>hendelse når det oppstår en betingelse som fører til at et ubehandlet unntak ved å kalle <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Services derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class ultimately derives from the WorkflowRuntimeService class.
trans-unit.target: Services avledet fra <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>klassen, den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>klasse, til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klassen, og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>klassen til slutt er avledet fra klassen WorkflowRuntimeService.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A> is initialized to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>initialiseres til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, representerer den metoden kalles når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren opphøyer den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class implements a two-phase starting mechanism so that workflow runtime engine services may perform any initialization that depends on other services after the workflow runtime engine has invoked the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method for all of its workflow runtime engine services.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen implementerer en tofaset Start mekanisme slik at arbeidsflyten runtime motoren services kan utføre initialisering som er avhengig av andre tjenester når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren har aktivert den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metoden for alle arbeidsflyten runtime motoren tjenestene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: After the workflow runtime engine has called the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method of all of its workflow runtime engine services, it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Etter kjøretiden arbeidsflyten engine har kalt den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metoden av alle arbeidsflyten runtime engine tjenestene den opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the OnStarted method to provide any final startup functionality required by your service when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre OnStarted-metoden for å angi en endelig startet funksjonaliteten som kreves av tjenesten når den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The mechanics of subscribing and unsubscribing from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled internally.
trans-unit.target: Mekanikere abonnerer og stoppe abonnementet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen behandles internt.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> after the workflow runtime engine has already been started, the workflow runtime engine will call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> on your service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis tjenesten legges til arbeidsflyten runtime motoren av et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>etter arbeidsflyten runtime-motoren er allerede startet, arbeidsflyt runtime motoren ringe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>på tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, in this situation, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event has already occurred, therefore, your service may have to perform any initialization that it would ordinarily perform in OnStarted from inside the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid i så fall den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>hendelsen allerede har funnet sted, må derfor tjenesten kan utføre initialisering som vanligvis ville Utfør i OnStarted fra inni den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>

trans-unit.source: You can test <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to determine whether the workflow runtime engine has been started.
trans-unit.target: Du kan teste <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>å finne ut om arbeidsflyten runtime engine er startet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A> is set to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> before OnStarted is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>før OnStarted aktiveres.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of OnStarted performs no action.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av OnStarted utfører noen handling.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, representerer den metoden kalles når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren opphøyer den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class implements a two-phase stopping mechanism so that workflow runtime engine services may retain some functionality after their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method is invoked by the workflow runtime engine in order that they may, if necessary, support the shutdown of other services.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen implementerer en tofaset stanser mekanisme slik at arbeidsflyten runtime motoren services kan beholde noe funksjonalitet etter deres <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metode startes av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren slik at de kan eventuelt støtter avslutning av andre tjenester.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: After the workflow runtime engine has called the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method of all of its workflow runtime engine services, it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Etter kjøretiden arbeidsflyten motoren har kalt den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metoden av alle arbeidsflyten runtime motoren tjenestene den opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the OnStopped method to provide any final shutdown functionality required by your service when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre OnStopped-metoden for å angi en siste gang du slår funksjonaliteten som kreves av tjenesten når den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The mechanics of subscribing and unsubscribing from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled internally.
trans-unit.target: Mekanikere abonnerer og stoppe abonnementet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen behandles internt.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> while the workflow runtime engine is running, the workflow runtime engine will call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> on your service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis din <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>er fjernet fra arbeidsflyten runtime engine av et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>mens arbeidsflyten runtime engine kjører, arbeidsflyt runtime engine ringe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>på tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: However, in this situation, the OnStopped method will not be called for your service.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid i så fall blir metoden OnStopped ikke kalt for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your service may have to perform any final shutdown that it would ordinarily perform in OnStopped from inside the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten må derfor kanskje til å utføre en siste gang du slår som vanligvis ville Utfør i OnStopped fra i den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can test <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to determine whether the workflow runtime engine is running.
trans-unit.target: Du kan teste <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>å finne ut om arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kjører.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A> is set to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> before OnStopped is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>før OnStopped aktiveres.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of OnStopped performs no action.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av OnStopped utfører noen handling.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Your service can call RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event when it encounters an exception that it cannot handle during its execution.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten kan ringe RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent opphøye i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>-hendelse når det oppstår et unntak som den ikke kan håndtere under kjøringen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You should pass the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Du må sende den <xref:System.Guid>til arbeidsflytforekomsten som er knyttet til et ubehandlet unntak.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: For example, a timer service might pass the <xref:System.Guid> associated with the timer for which the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en Tidtakertjenesten kan sendes av <xref:System.Guid>som er forbundet med tidtakeren for unntaket oppstod.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The exception that could not be handled.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket ikke kan behandles.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>til arbeidsflytforekomsten som er knyttet til et ubehandlet unntak.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> for this service.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> for denne tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine sets this property before it calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> on the service.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren, settes denne egenskapen før du kaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>på tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, starts the service and changes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*> to <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, starter tjenesten og endringene i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*>til <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*>

trans-unit.source: Start is invoked by the workflow runtime engine on all of its services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Start startes av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren på alle tjenestene som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klasse når <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>kalles.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: Start is also invoked by the workflow runtime engine when a workflow runtime engine service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> after the workflow runtime engine has already started.
trans-unit.target: Start aktiveres også av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren når en arbeidsflyt runtime motortjeneste legges til arbeidsflyten runtime motoren av et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>etter arbeidsflyten runtime-motoren er allerede startet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of Start tracks whether the service has been started and uses this information to throw the appropriate exception if the service is started while it is already running.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av Start sporer om tjenesten er startet, og bruker denne informasjonen til å iverksette det riktige unntaket Hvis tjenesten startes mens den kjører allerede.

trans-unit.source: You can provide additional functionality necessary to have your service started by the workflow runtime engine by overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi flere funksjoner som er nødvendig for å få tjenesten startes av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren ved å overstyre denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee about which, if any, services will be running when the workflow runtime engine calls Start on your service.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen garantier om som eventuelt tjenester kjører når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kaller starten på tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, in the Start method, you should only perform any initialization that does not depend on functionality provided by other services.
trans-unit.target: Derfor i Start-metoden bør du bare utføre initialisering som ikke er avhenger av funksjonaliteten i andre tjenester.

trans-unit.source: This includes functionality provided by core services such as the scheduler service.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter funksjonaliteten i kjernetjenester som planleggingstjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event after it has called the Start method of all of its workflow runtime engine services.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime engine opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen når den kalles metoden starten av alle arbeidsflyten runtime engine services.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your service requires additional initialization after all of the workflow runtime engine services have been started, you can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> method in order to perform this initialization when the Start event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tjenesten krever ekstra initialisering etter alle arbeidsflyten runtime motoren tjenester har startet, du kan overstyre den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>metode for å utføre denne initialisering når Start-hendelsen skjer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> after the workflow runtime engine has already been started, the workflow runtime engine will call Start on your service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis tjenesten legges til arbeidsflyten runtime motoren av et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>etter arbeidsflyten runtime-motoren er allerede startet, arbeidsflyt runtime motoren ringe starten på tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, in this situation, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event has already occurred, therefore, your service may have to perform any initialization that it would ordinarily perform in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> from inside the Start method.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid i så fall den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>hendelsen allerede har funnet sted, må derfor tjenesten kan utføre initialisering som vanligvis ville Utfør i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>fra i Start-metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>

trans-unit.source: You can test <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to determine whether the workflow runtime engine has been started.
trans-unit.target: Du kan teste <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>å finne ut om arbeidsflyten runtime engine er startet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Start should only be called by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Start kan bare kalles av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) -or- The service has already been started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*>er et nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic) - eller - tjenesten er allerede startet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class implements two-phase mechanisms for both starting and stopping a workflow runtime engine service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen implementerer tofaset mekanismer for både starte og stoppe motortjeneste en arbeidsflyt-kjøretiden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: The first phase of the start mechanism begins when the workflow runtime engine calls the implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method for the service.
trans-unit.target: Den første fasen start mekanisme starter når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kaller implementeringen av den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metode for tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should call the base implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>, which sets State to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: Denne bør metodekall base implementeringen av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>, som angir tilstand for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second phase occurs after the workflow runtime engine starts all of its workflow runtime engine services when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event.
trans-unit.target: Fase skjer når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren starter alle arbeidsflyten runtime motoren tjenestene når den opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> internally manages a subscription to this event and its handler will set State to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>administrerer internt et abonnement til denne hendelsen, og behandlingsprogrammet angi tilstanden til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: The two-phase mechanism for stopping a workflow runtime engine service begins when the workflow runtime engine calls the implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method for the service.
trans-unit.target: Tofaset mekanisme for å stoppe en arbeidsflyt runtime engine-tjenesten starter når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kaller implementeringen av den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metode for tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should call the base implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>, which sets State to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: Denne bør metodekall base implementeringen av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>, som angir tilstand for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: After it has stopped all of its workflow runtime engine services, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> event.
trans-unit.target: Etter at den ikke lenger alle arbeidsflyten runtime motoren tjenestene, arbeidsflyt runtime motoren opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped>hendelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> internally manages a subscription to this event and its handler will set State to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>administrerer internt et abonnement til denne hendelsen, og behandlingsprogrammet angi tilstanden til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, stops the service and changes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*> to <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, stopper tjenesten og endringene i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*>til <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*>

trans-unit.source: Stop is invoked by the workflow runtime engine on all of its services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Stopp startes av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren på alle tjenestene som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klasse når <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>kalles.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: Stop is also invoked by the workflow runtime engine when a workflow runtime engine service is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Stopp aktiveres også av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren når en arbeidsflyt runtime-motortjeneste er fjernet fra arbeidsflyten runtime motoren av et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of Stop tracks whether the service has been started and uses this information to throw the appropriate exception if the service is stopped before it is started.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av Stopp sporer om tjenesten er startet, og bruker denne informasjonen til å iverksette det riktige unntaket Hvis tjenesten stoppes før den er startet.

trans-unit.source: You can provide additional functionality necessary to have your service stopped by the workflow runtime engine by overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi flere funksjoner som er nødvendig for å få tjenesten stoppet av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren ved å overstyre denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee about which, if any, services will be stopped or running when Stop is called on your service.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen garantier om hvilke, hvis eventuelle tjenester vil bli stoppet eller kjører ved Stopp kall til tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event after it has called the Stop method of all of its workflow runtime engine services.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime engine opphøyer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen når den kalles Stop-metoden for alle arbeidsflyten runtime engine services.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Your service may need to retain some residual functionality to support other services until all the workflow runtime engine services have had their stop methods invoked by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten må kanskje beholde noen gjenværende funksjoner som støtter andre tjenester før alle arbeidsflyten runtime engine tjenestene har hatt Stopp metodene startes av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren.

trans-unit.source: If your service must retain such functionality, you can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> method to perform any additional action required to finish stopping your service when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tjenesten må beholde slik funksjonalitet, kan du overstyre den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>metode for å utføre enhver ytterligere handling kreves for å fullføre stopper tjenesten når den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> while the workflow runtime engine is running, the workflow runtime engine will call Stop on your service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis din <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>er fjernet fra arbeidsflyten runtime motoren av et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>mens arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kjører, arbeidsflyt runtime motoren kalle Stopp på tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: However, in this situation, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> method will not be called for your service.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid i så fall den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>metoden skal ikke kalles for tjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your service may have to perform any additional shutdown functionality that it would ordinarily perform in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> from inside the Stop method.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten må derfor kanskje til å utføre flere avsluttet funksjonalitet som vanligvis ville Utfør i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>fra i Stop-metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can test <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to determine whether the workflow runtime engine is running.
trans-unit.target: Du kan teste <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>å finne ut om arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kjører.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stop should only be called by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Stopp bør bare kalles av arbeidsflyten runtime motoren.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*>er en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*>

trans-unit.source: -or- The service has not yet been started.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tjenesten har ennå ikke er startet.
